blacklight: Pour about 15mL of water into a cup, dip the tip of a red highlighter in the water and squeeze out a drop.
Pour about 15mL of water into a cup, dip the tip of a green highlighter in the water and squeeze out a drop.
Pour about 15mL of water into a cup, dip the tip of a yellow highlighter in the water and squeeze out a drop.
Take out the powdered detergent into a cup, add about 15mL of water and dissolve it.
Shine a black light on each liquid to examine its luminescence color.
Mix powdered detergent, red, and green liquid in a cup.
Mix powdered detergent and yellow liquid in a cup.
Check the color of the mixed liquid by shining a black light on it to see if it turns white.
cardboard: Draw auxiliary lines of the shape and the fold on cardboard according to dimensional drawings.
Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape
Leave the ends of the liner for gluing.
Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold.
Fold along the incisions of the fold.
Tape a lid paper and a bottom paper to the cardboard to secure them in place.
Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape on the paper.
Make a cross-shaped incision in the lid.
Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.
Fold along the incisions of the fold.
Put chopsticks through the cutout in the lid to widen the hole.
Adhere the lid and the bottom with glue so that they cover the body.
electronics: Connect the battery box and switch S1 in series.
Connect the switch S1 and motor in series.
Connect switch S2 and lamp L1 in parallel.
Connect the switch S2 in series with the motor and the battery box.
Put a propeller on the motor.
Put two battery in the battery box.
ion: Put a microplate on a grid of a worksheet.
Take a pair of tweezers out of a bag.
Put three copper plates on the left column of the microplate using the pair of tweezers.
Put three zinc plates on the center column of the microplate using the pair of tweezers.
Put three magnesium plates on the right column of the microplate using the pair of tweezers.
Put a drop of copper sulfate aqueous solution on each first row of the metal plates.
Put a drop of zinc sulfate aqueous solution on each middle row of the metal plates.
Put a drop of magnesium sulfate aqueous solution on each last row of the metal plates.
Fill in a table in the worksheet with results, and then write down names of metals in the worksheet frorm the most reactive one.
tsumiki: Arrange three cube blocks in a row from left to right in the order of blue, green, and yellow.
Bridge two long thin cuboid blocks on the square blocks from left to right in the order of blue and green.
Stand three short thin cuboid blocks equally spaced from left to right in the order of blue, green, and yellow.
Bridge two long thin cuboid blocks on the upright blocks from left to right in the order of yellow and red.
Place two thick cuboid blocks on the bridge, laying them down in order from left to right, yellow to red.
Lay one blue thick cuboid block down and stack it in the upper center of the yellow and the red bhick cuboid blocks.
Place two triangular prism blocks on both sides of the blue thick cuboid block from left to right in the order of blue and red.
